name: Even At the End of the World
name_original: Even At the End of the World
description:
Jaxon Bryal is a Freshman College student, who was supposed to enjoy his first year at college.

However, it seems like the world has different plans. Throwing him into a zombie apocalypse, he will have to escape and survive with those he meets on the way.

Help him and his group survive the first day of the end of the world!

Featuring:

30-40 minutes of gameplay [Around 9,035 words]

5 Endings! (Well...4 bad ends and a good one)

Content Warning: Swearing, gruesome zombie deaths/descriptions

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the NaNoRenO 2022 game jam!

Story by: Horrorbox

Coding by: Horrorbox & tochelotu

Art by: causticFish

Music & Sfx: hit3c

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note this game may continue to have minor updates after the jam, if there are any bugs please let me know!
